Name: Offering table
Description: A small limestone offering table, shaped in a stylised 'htp'-sign form, with three lines of incised hieratic inscription, an abbreviated version of the htp-dj-nsw offering formula. There are two rectangular troughs and a narrow central channel carved out below the inscription.The execution of the text is rough and the table has been left unsmoothed at the back. The surface of the stone is a little worn and the inscription is now difficult to read.
